description: Why spend $30 on a stand-alone financial calculator when you can carry the same capability around in your phone for $4?  TVMCalc includes Net Present Value and Internal Rate of Return on cash flows with uneven payment streams! Now more than ever it's easy to leave your financial calculator at home!  TVMCalc performs time value of money calculations such as mortgage and loan payments and rate of return on investment.  TVMCalc is easy to use and contains full instructions and examples in the Help section.  Master your financial future with TVMCalc!  Begin and End modes are supported.  In addition to TVM calculations, TVMCalc serves as a standard 4-function calculator and contains a memory register.  It works seamlessly on both the Palm Pre and the Palm Pixi.
